page.title: 08SILK WILLOUGHBY POST OFFICE
page.content:
There has been a{Post Office}in the village for 70 years. Mary Bugg has been{postmistress}for 10 years. Thursdays are the busiest days as {pensions}are collected and there are a lot of casual customers.
Usually the mornings are busiest. The Post Office opens at 9.30 and closes at 5.30, with a break for lunch at 12 noon.
Mrs Bugg has seen changes in the job of the postmistress.{Child {allowances}and{pensions}have increased and the{DHSS}strike of 1984 caused much extra work.
The building has not always been a Post Office. Poultry and pigs were once kept there.
